value.text:
Rex Lapis
Deus Auri
Prime of Adepti
God of Contracts
Lord of Geo

customize.text: 3,700 years ago, Morax founded Liyue and contracted with the Adepti to protect the city. 37 centuries later, Rex Lapis faked his death to test whether the people of Liyue could live without his protection. When the mortals passed the test, Morax stepped down as Archon for the people and began to live the life of a mortal.

customize.name: Adepti
customize.desc: Adepti are a group of immortal illuminated beasts of Liyue, who have protected people for millennia.

customize.text: Morax is the Prime of Adepti. Together with other Adepti, he ruled Liyue.

customize.name: Guizhong
customize.desc: The God of Dust, also known as Haagentus. She died in the Archon War.

customize.name: Guoba
customize.desc: Xiangling's friend, who inseparably accompanies her and helps with the cooking.

customize.name: Azhdaha
customize.desc: Elemental life form whose lifespan far exceeds that of mankind, brought by Rex Lapis to the surface. Morax carved him into a dragon and gave him eyes to see the sun. Azhdaha had been a friend and ally of the Geo Archon for many years.

customize.text: Rex Lapis gave Azhdaha sight and made a contract with him to protect Liyue. When the erosion caused Azhdaha to forget his agreement and attack the people, Morax tried to share his power with him to stop the erosion, but was forced to seal his friend away.

customize.name: Osial
customize.desc: Overlord of the Vortex, who was defeated by Rex Lapis during the Archon War.

customize.name: Orobashi
customize.desc: The Serpent God, who brought the people of Enkanomiya out of the Dark Sea and onto the surface. He was killed by Raiden Ei.

customize.name: Archon War
customize.desc: The war for the divine thrones, declared by the Heavenly Principles. As a result of the Archon War that finished about 2000 years ago, seven rulers of seven nations received the Gnoses, the divine throne, and the title of an Archon.

customize.name: Tsaritsa
customize.desc: The Cryo Archon of Snezhnaya.

customize.text: The Cryo Archon of Snezhnaya made a contract with Morax to get his

customize.name: Gnosis
customize.desc: Gnoses are internal magical foci that each of The Seven possesses, allowing them to resonate directly with Celestia itself and serving as an emblem of their status. The Gnoses were created from the remains of the Third Descender.

customize.name: La Signora
customize.desc: The Eighth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, also known as The Fair Lady. Her real name is Rosalyne-Kruzchka Lohefalter.

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: The Eleventh of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as Childe. His real name is Ajax.

customize.text: The Fatui Harbinger who tried to obtain the Geo Gnosis. He awakened Osial so that the Geo Archon, who had faked his death, would be forced to return and save Liyue.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.text: Morax's mortal persona, an expert in Liyue history contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. To avoid any suspicions, Zhongli uses a fake

customize.name: Vision
customize.desc: Visions are external magical foci bestowed by Celestia and The Seven upon Allogenes, a small minority of people with strong desires, allowing them to channel a specific elemental power. Every wielder of a Vision is able to attain godhood and ascend to Celestia.

customize.name: Barbatos
customize.desc: The Anemo Archon of Mondstadt.

customize.text: The Anemo Archon and Morax's friend. They are the only original Archons out of seven.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Vortex Vanquisher
customize.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

customize.name: Memory of Dust
customize.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

customize.name: The Unforged
customize.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

customize.name: Summit Shaper
customize.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
